summary: An updated version of Mage Apparel Overhaul which includes support for Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Requires Dawnguard, Dragonborn and the Unofficial Skyrim Patch.[/b]

Mage Apparel Overhaul integrates robes which Bethesda left out of the base game into Skyrim with both enchanted and unenchanted variants which can be purchased from all merchants that sell clothes. It also modifies several robes and other pieces of apparel to be more practical and compatible with Mage Armour. MAO also adds cloth variants of vampire apparel which are compatible with Mage Armour, more varied mage loot and more.

[b]Enchanted Apparel Added:[/b]

Brown Mage Robes
Brown Hooded Mage Robes
Green Mage Robes
Green Hooded Mage Robes
Red Mage Robes
Red Hooded Mage Robes
Grey Mage Robes
Grey Hooded Mage Robes
- All Robes have +75% Magicka Regen and all Hooded Robes additionally have +40 Magicka.
- Greater Variants can be purchased as soon as you reach Level 25. They have +125% Magicka Regen and +50 Magicka.
Enchanted Gloves
Enchanted Vampire Gloves 
Enchanted Vampire Gauntlets
Enchanted Vampire Boots
- The Vampire Gauntlets and Boots are cloth, armour-free copies of the gauntlets and boots added by the Dawnguard DLC.

[b]Unenchanted Apparel Added:[/b]

Brown Robes
Brown Hooded Robes
Green Robes
Green Hooded Robes
Red Robes
Red Hooded Robes
Grey Robes
Grey Hooded Robes
Vampire Gauntlets
Vampire Boots

[b]Robes Modified:[/b]

Thalmor Robes: 100% Magicka Regen, -17% Destruction Cost.
Thalmor Hooded Robes: 100% Magicka Regen, -17% Destruction Cost, +50 Magicka.
Shrouded Robes: +75% Magicka Regen, -15% Destruction Cost, +50 Magicka.
Black Robes: 100% Magicka Regen.
Blue Hooded Robes: 100% Magicka Regen, +40 Magicka.
Black Hooded Robes: 100% Magicka Regen, +40 Magicka.
Necromancer's Robes: 75% Magicka Regen, -15% Conjuration Cost.
Hooded Necromancer's Robes: 75% Magicka Regen, -15% Conjuration Cost, +40 Magicka.
Warlock Robes: 50% - 100% Magicka Regen.
Hooded Warlock Robes: 50% - 100% Magicka Regen, 25 - 50 Magicka.
Hooded Necromage Robes: 50% - 100% Magicka Regen, 25 - 50 Magicka.
- Warlock Robes / Necromage Robes are now worth a fair bit of gold and Hooded variants of Warlock / Necromage Robes have been labelled as such.

[b]Apparel Modified:[/b]

Nahkriin: Removed Armour Rating and Armour classification. Added appropriate keywords and dropped weight to 4.
Vokun: Removed Armour Rating and Armour classification. Added appropriate keywords and dropped weight to 4.
Morokei: Removed Armour Rating and Armour classification. Added appropriate keywords and dropped weight to 4. Added +20% Shout Recovery.
Ahzidal: Removed Armour Rating and Armour classification. Added appropriate keywords and dropped weight to 4.
Dukaan: Removed Armour Rating and Armour classification. Added appropriate keywords and dropped weight to 4.
Zahkriisos: Removed Armour Rating and Armour classification. Added appropriate keywords and dropped weight to 4.
Diadem of the Savant: Removed Armour Rating and Armour classification. Added appropriate keywords and dropped weight to 2, which is the weight of all other Circlets. Now grants -10% Cost Reduction to all schools.
Mage's Circlet: +40 Magicka, regardless of level.
Gauldur Amulet: +50 Health, Magicka and Stamina. Also applies to the fragments.
Saarthal Amulet: -5% Spell Cost.
Archmage Robes: +125% Magicka Regen from 100%. Also modified the Hoodless Variant.
Archmage Boots: Universal Magic Resist.

[b]Dawnguard Mage Apparel:[/b]

Merchants now sell unenchanted cloth varients of Vampire Gloves and Boots.
Ronthil now sells unenchanted cloth varients of all three types of Vampire Armor.
Harkon now wears a cloth varient of the Royal Vampire Armor. The armored varient can still be acquired in the Castle Volikhar Ruins.

[b]Unique Outfits:[/b]

Many Wizards, Warlocks, Alchemists, Priests, Priestesses, Court Mages and Skill Trainers now wear the Robes added by MAO and also wear a greater variety of Robes. Some lucky individuals have been given unique apparel. These outfits will not cause any compatibility issues. Worst case scenario, the outfits added by MAO will be overwritten by other mods and you'll be none the wiser.

[b]Varied Mage Loot:

[/b]Mages wear a greater variety of robes, carry alchemy ingredients and occasionally carry books and destruction staves.
author: OccasionalCucumber
